item.title: Husband and wife accused of using spycam and earpieces to win almost Â£600k at Australian casino
item.description: The husband and wife are alleged to have used a range of devices - including earpieces - to cheat card games over a number of weeks.

item.title: Climate protesters in kayaks disrupt operations at Australia port
item.description: Dozens have been arrested during climate protests at one of the world's biggest coal export ports.

item.title: Four killed in shooting at family gathering in California
item.description: Police say 10 others are injured in what they believe is a "targeted" shooting, with children among the victims.

item.title: Hong Kong fire death toll rises to 146 as thousands pay respects
item.description: Authorities say they have completed searches of four of the seven towers as part of a criminal investigation.

item.title: More than 400 killed in Indonesia flooding, officials say
item.description: Hundreds have been killed across South East Asia, with monsoons exacerbated by cyclones also affecting Thailand and Malaysia.
